title: This is bs....

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Why Riot??????? I go to try and play off my queue and this happens 3 matches in a row. It really annoys me when i have to wait 40 minutes for a game. Please fix riot.

replies.body: This was a known issue a little while back, wasn't aware there were still people affected by it. Did you receive your low priority queue some time ago or was it recent?
I received it the same day.

If it happens again I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support. They may not be able to fix it (it was an issue for a while when it was widespread, I gather it wasn't an easy fix), but at least they will be aware it is still affecting some people.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
